tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE artworks (
  artwork_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  artwork_title VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  artist_id INT,
  year_created INT,
  style VARCHAR(100),
  price DECIMAL(10,2)
);

CREATE TABLE artworks (
  artwork_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  artwork_title VARCHAR(200) NOT NULL,
  artist_id UUID REFERENCES artists(artist_id),
  creation_date DATE,
  price DECIMAL(10, 2)
);

CREATE TABLE artworks (
    artwork_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    artwork_title VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    artwork_artist_id INT,
    artwork_creation_date DATE,
    artwork_style VARCHAR(50),
    FOREIGN KEY (artwork_artist_id) REFERENCES artists(artist_id)
);

CREATE TABLE artworks (
    artwork_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    artwork_name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    artist_id INT,
    artwork_description TEXT,
    FOREIGN KEY (artist_id) REFERENCES artists(artist_id)
);

CREATE TABLE exhibition_artwork (
    exhibition_id INT,
    artwork_id INT,
    PRIMARY KEY (exhibition_id, artwork_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (exhibition_id) REFERENCES exhibitions(exhibition_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (artwork_id) REFERENCES artworks(artwork_id)
);

CREATE TABLE artworks (
    artwork_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    artwork_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    artist_id INT,
    creation_date DATE,
    style VARCHAR(50),
    price DECIMAL(10,2)
);

CREATE TABLE exhibitions (
    exhibition_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    exhibition_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    start_date DATE,
    end_date DATE,
    location VARCHAR(100)
);
